# Challenge: Flatten a Nested Array

## Problem

Write a function that takes a deeply nested array and returns a flat array with all elements at the top level.

## Example

```javascript
flatten([1, [2, [3, 4], 5], 6]);
// => [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
```

## Your Solution

```javascript
function flatten(arr) {
  // implement this
}
```
